mapper.select: SELECT a.enterpriseno, a.userat, b.enterprisename FROM tb_users_detail a left outer join tb_enterprises b on a.enterpriseno = b.enterpriseno WHERE a.userno = #{seq} and a.userat = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_users SET userpassword = #{userpasswordnew}, updatedate = now() WHERE userno = #{userno} and userpassword = #{userpassword}
mapper.select: SELECT enterpriseno, enterprisename FROM tb_enterprises WHERE enterprisename like '%' || #{enterprisename} || '%' ORDER BY enterpriseno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_users SET userprofileimg = #{userprofileimg}, updatedate = now() WHERE userno = #{userno}

select a.*,b.*,c.* from tb_users a left outer join tb_score b on a.userno = b.userno left outer join tb_users_detail c on a.userno = c.userno where b.score is not null and (c.representat = 0 or c.representat is null) order by b.score desc
